id.description: The unique identifier for the automation statistics

bounce_drops.description: The number of emails that were dropped due to a hard bounce

bounces.description: The total number of emails that bounced

clicks.description: The total number of clicks on links within the emails

delivered.description: The total number of emails delivered successfully

invalid_emails.description: The number of emails that were invalid and not sent

opens.description: The total number of times emails were opened

requests.description: The total number of requests made for sending emails

spam_report_drops.description: The number of emails that were dropped due to spam reports

spam_reports.description: The total number of spam reports received for the emails

unique_clicks.description: The number of unique clicks on links within the emails

unique_opens.description: The number of unique times emails were opened

unsubscribes.description: The total number of email recipients who unsubscribed

aggregation.description: The type of aggregation for the stats data (e.g., daily, weekly, monthly)

step_id.description: The unique identifier for the step in the automation flow
